title: DAB Converter Development for EV Charging Application (1 kW) Efficient Power Circuit Design

descriptions.text: Designed a 1 kW Dual Active Bridge (DAB) Converter for EV charging systems with precise voltage ranges (High Voltage Side: 120–150 V DC; Low Voltage Side: 24–48 V DC). The design included high-frequency MOSFET switching for efficient bidirectional power transfer.
Advanced Control Techniques: Implemented a state-space model with optimized PI control loops to regulate voltage and current, ensuring stable operation during variable load conditions.

Real-Time DSP Control: Deployed control algorithms on a TI DSP C2000 (TMS320F28393) microcontroller for high-precision transient behavior analysis, adaptive control, and seamless power flow during charging and discharging cycles.

Application Impact: Enhanced energy efficiency and reliability for 1 kW EV chargers, enabling smooth integration with energy storage and DC microgrids, tailored for compact and scalable EV charging applications.
